list: Your response helps us to provide real-time information during the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak.
This is so the government has the information it needs to manage the UK’s response to the coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic.

content.description: Thank you for completing this survey at this challenging time.
View the questions before you start the survey (external link)

list: Information should relate to the UK.
You do not need to provide actual data.
We will treat your information securely and confidentially.

questions.question: Section one: Financial performance of your business

content.description: This section asks for information on any changes during the last two weeks, and expectations for the next two weeks, to:

list: your business's trading status
your business's turnover
your business's imports and exports
the availability and prices of materials, goods and services
your business's financial resources

questions.question: Section two: Operational performance of your business

content.description: This section asks for information any changes to the size and capacity of your workforce during the last two weeks and expectations for the next two weeks.

questions.question: Section three: Other financial or operational changes

content.description: This section asks for information on any other changes to financial and/or operational activities in the last two weeks not already covered, and expectations over the next two weeks.

blocks.title: Financial performance of your business
blocks.description:
This section asks for information on any changes during the last two weeks, and expectations for the next two weeks, to:

  • your business's trading status
  • your business's turnover
  • your business's imports and exports
  • the availability and prices of materials, goods and services
  • your business's financial resources

questions.title: Was the financial performance of {{ metadata['ru_name'] }} within normal expectations in the last two weeks?

questions.title: Has {{ metadata['ru_name'] }} applied for any of the following initiatives?

options.label: Coronavirus Job Retention Scheme
options.description: UK Government scheme that covers 80% of pay (up to 2,500 a month) for furloughed staff

options.label: Government-funded small business grant or loan schemes
options.value: Government-funded small business grant or loan schemes
options.description: For example, rural rate relief or property rate relief

options.label: Accredited finance agreements
options.description: For example, COVID Corporate Financing Facility (CCFF) or Coronavirus Business Interruption Loan Scheme (CBILS)

options.label: We have not applied for any of these initiatives
options.value: We have not applied for any of these initiatives

values: Government-funded small business grant or loan schemes

options.value: We haven't received any that we applied for

blocks.title: Operational performance of your business
blocks.description:
This section asks you for information on any:

  • changes to the size and capacity of your workforce during the last two weeks
  • expectations over the next two weeks
  • intentions to use coronavirus (COVID-19) initiatives to manage business performance
